review: I was using it for more than 3 to 4 months and the experience was great. Multitasking mode is great but does not work everytime( while taking a break by pausing the app when the multitask button is on, if you have to use another app in this period you might feel disappointed after switching back to Flipd). Worst part is recently it is not saving the study time. In addition to the previous version had 1hour sessions which is a terrible missing in the new one.

The app has a great design. But it lacks 1. user customizable app whitelisting. 2. Automatically start on scheduled time. I think these two features are important for the app. Also, as it works in the subscription model, it would be better to get these features rolled out at the earliest as it might be easy to lose customer base.
ras4vb: Hey Preethi, thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We appreciate your feedback and will share this with the team. - Melissa

review: The app crashes way too many times. The timer stops midway automatically and the progress is lost too which defeats the whole purpose. The app has lesser and no new features like work with a friend, as compared to the iOS app even after buying their premium service. Problem still remains after the update. The times stops automatically and the progress is lost. And additional features are still missing.
ras4vb: Hi Himanshu, thanks for your review and I'm sorry for the trouble! Can you please try updating Flipd to the latest version?

review: Flipd is the real anti phone addiction App I was always looking for! It force shuts you out of your phone. Literally! The only thing Is.. there actually is a way for you to close the app and exit the force shut, but only if you're fast enough before it shuts you out of the previous apps opened screen as well. The app will be a total beast once this bug is fixed! Rating it a well deserved 4 star. Only wish the white list could be customizable. Do that and Flipd will be untouched by other apps.
ras4vb: Thanks Miks03  for the kind words and feedback. We will share with the team. - Melissa

review: I have been using this app for over 2-3 years and I have been overall pleased with the app, having ranked among the top 5 users. It's saved me hundreds of thousands of minutes and I'm really glad. However, it sometimes stops working midway, meaning that the countdown suddenly stops and I am able to access all my apps and even delete Flipd. I have recognised two reasons why it generally happens: 1. If I charge my phone when it is underway 2. If the battery dips below 15% Please rectify!
ras4vb: Thanks Ananya  for your kind words and feedback. If you continue having trouble, please send an email to info@flipdapp.co. - Melissa

review: A really good app! Helps me stay productive and get id of distractions when I'm studying! My productivity levels have gone up ever since O got this app. Unfortunately, it does not allow a custom timer for the free version. Also, I'm not sure if we can create a custom whitelist, because I'd like to add an app or two in it. But otherwise, really good app!

This app does help me stay focused. Well created. Id like to bring to your notice that the time the app takes to lock the screen once minimized is sufficient to uninstall it. Since i know this, it takes a little extra effort to stay off my phone. All I would have to do is minimize, quickly uninstall, use my phone instead of studying and reinstall afterwards. It would be great if you could probably reduce the recovery time of the lock so I'd be locked out for the selected period.
ras4vb: Hey Ankita, we're so happy to hear you enjoy using Flipd! Thanks so much for your feedback. We'll share this with the team. - Melissa

review: It took time for me to adjust to the old flip but I did and it was good. It was a place just for me and now the entire interface is so social media-istic, I simply hate it. The old flipd was supposed to be for me and just for me, and now all the 'just for me' features are locked for premium and the entire thing is 'community' based. This was supposed to be an escape and now it's neither peaceful nor mindful. It's hectic like any other mind- draining app.
ras4vb: Hi Aditi, thanks for your feedback and taking time to leave this review! Have you considered upgrading to a premium subscription? If you enjoy all of Flipd's features, subscribing gives you access to everything! If you're interested, send us an email to info@flipdapp.co and we'll set you up on a free trial. - Alanna

review: I like the app, it has made me more productive especially the phone lock down option. However I would like if it has option to schedule full lock especially during night time. Reminders don't seem to help me :) I read elsewhere that even premium doesn't have that option yet. Would be great if that option is introduced at the earliest.

DO NOT , I REPEAT DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP I had installed this app and it encrypted my phone and modified the system settings in such a way that I was unable to click photos, screenshots , open any social media app or anything. It felt like hell. Finally I had to take my phone to the service center they had to factory reset it in order to fix it. But still my SD card is encrypted and I couldn't decrypt it and lost all my music and photos ( the ones without backup) . So please I request you don't INSTALL THIS APP. Try offtime it's safer and doesn't encrypt your phone.

This is a lovely app, I love its ambience and feel. Flipd motivates me to study, and virtual study groups are so much better and focussed than real ones, and Flipd lets me have one. Things I'd like to see in this app are: ‚Ä¢ A place to write a to-do or a time-table for the day and then the week. ‚Ä¢ Reminder notifications incase, we've been away from it and not been studying. All in all, a great app! Keep up the good work, Team Flipd!
ras4vb: Hi Nandika, thanks for taking the time to leave this review! We really appreciate your feedback and will consider adding those features to the app. :) - Alanna

review: Is there any possible way we can change the settings so we can't just simply cancel the focus lock. Seems very pointless that once my phone is locked all i have to do is cancel it. What's the point in having a whitefish. I regret paying for this app. The free version was better.

I really loved to use this app.....this is really good for students who wants to study with Focus..... And the best point that I like in this app is that you can select the background sound also....loved it.... Thanks üëç

Really useful app to study and focus.Music are also a supply to clam and relax.But,one thing the only thing I won't appreciate is once I study40mins and save the progress but it's not recorded.Not only once, again and again.I'm so sick of it.Except of that one, everything will be 5 stars for this app.Please fix it .
Timer stopped Sometimes the timer don't save the progress,and you manually cant add it , it's very irritating .

This app is great i downloaded it today and it's great but the thing is it doesn't save your stats means the total time you studied/focused ...Please fix this bug in next update.....i don't want to uninstall it so please

NOT a way to force yourself off your device! This has a feature that temporarily bricks your device if you have problems unplugging to go to bed or to work, etc. Unfortunately, it can't be scheduled which defeats the purpose.
The app is alright, but I'm unable to open it on my Pixel 7 - it just crashes every time so I think I'm done with it for now.
when i use the focus lock mode during the saving of time or during the end it just doesn't load and the next time i get into app i will be stuck in that page

UPDATE: with the last version, most of the bugs was gone, and I was really enjoying the app again. However, with the last update my phone has started to crash every 5 minutes or so. I downgraded to an old version (using an APK site) and the problem disappeared. This update was clearly not fit for release yet...Have written to support but no response in a week's time.
ras4vb: Hi Siri, thanks for taking the time to leave this review. We're aware of these issues you've brought up and will be addressing them soon. Thanks for your patience in the meantime and if you have other feedback let us know at info@flipdapp.co! - Alanna

review: Log in doesn't work, I enter email, I get the link, app says "can't log in, use other method" (0022)?? When will it get fixed?

This is the best app I could find that helps me have a stable study time. It also have costome music you could put on to help you focus. I would highly recommend so use this app whenever you need to study
Please bring the update with weekly graphs and pie charts ! Please Dev...

Aw man, I really liked the old version despite not having the whitelist option. I enjoyed having a choice between the stricter full lock mode and the normal mode, as well as the ability to set 1, 2, 4, 8 and 12 hours full lock as a student without the full version. In the new update, finding that this was removed and I can only set a maximum of 40 minutes is extremely disappointing. It also breaks the competition system ‚òπÔ∏è. Wish the developers would add these features back in or revert it.
ras4vb: Hi Javier, thanks for your feedback! We put a lot of work into this new update based on user research & feedback. Full Lock is still available under Focus Lock now, and it includes a Whitelist option too. Although some features now require a subscription, we hope that if you enjoy using Flipd that you'll consider subscribing! - Alanna

review: I am so flippin' happy with this app! It is so effective and exactly what I needed. I love that I can still use some functions, like text, call, Google Maps, Calendar, calculator, and clock/alarm. Thus I am not "disabled" like we all fear of being when taking a phone detox, but I am also totally unable to waste my time shopping online or looking at social media. In all honesty, I should leave Flipd on all the time! The ONLY wish I have is that I could pre-select which apps are allowed before I Flip off. E.g., I'd rather be able to use Waze than Google Maps, and I'd like to have access to my Gmail and notes apps.

Not having a music player when my phone is flipd off is a major downside. It is amazing for keeping me off my phone, but right now I would like to have my phone flipd off AND enjoy the radio station I am currently listening to via app, and I can only have one or the other. I would probably buy a subscription if I could access music apps when my phone is locked. ***Edit: after my phone's latest update my whitelist apps no longer work in lock mode. super disappointing, glad I didn't buy premium.

It feels like a challenge, like the timer is challenging me "hey, bet you can't study for an hour" makes me feel excited whenever I study, which also makes studying a lot more enjoyable and comfortable especially with the musics. It is a bit on the laggy side so I wish you could fix that issue, other than that this app is amazing. Thank you :)

Lovely app. Just one tiny suggestion. It'd be awesome if I can choose my whitelisted apps. I've read the FAQ and they said it's better if they choose it. I understand that and I agree. But if you could whitelist the apps that are categorized in play store as educational it would be great. I'd like to use my scientific calculator and some other dictionary etc, while "flipping off".

I've been using Flipd premium for a few months on my OnePlus 6 android phone. However it's become unusable recently because of a major bug.   1) The full lock countdown isn't working properly. e.g. every time I set a 6hr time lock before sleeping the countdown pauses at some point. So when I wake up 8 hrs later there's still 4 hrs on the countdown etc.   This is seriously annoying! My phone is locked right now ...   2) Not a bug but a feature request. Flipd in their FAQ's say it isn't possible to allow users to make their own personal whitelist of apps due to tech constraints. However, for Android at least this is not true.   I have several other competing apps that allow me to do just this.   The idea that it's better for Flipd to only provide a short list of whitelisted apps is shortsighted to say the least. Every User is different, certain apps are only useful in certain countries etc. Please change this so you can provide a decent user experience.    I for one won't be renewing my subscription until I see these improvements. It's a great app, just needs significant upgrades.

Well I'd say the concept is great. The free version is almost useless. The timer stops exactly 40 minutes, and I have to open the app again to save the record and then continue another 40 mins... that's just very distracting. I cant afford a premium coz I'm s student and I don't have a credit card and I'm sure so many users can relate. Study/focus apps normally have a feature for students who don't have credit cards..anyways, the app is amazing.. the design and the UI is great. That's about it.

The focus lock option has changed since the update. Not only does it limit the time on free mode. I can only go up to 40 minutes which is not ideal at all. It also glitches out when you attempt to use the focus lock. I will be searching for another app because this was my favorite but it's become very disappointing and the reviews show that.
ras4vb: Hi Rachel, thanks for taking the time to leave a review. There are many features that you can still enjoy for free, but we also depend on our subscribers to continue improving and maintaining the app. We don't advertise or sell your data. Please let us know at info@flipdapp.co if you would like to explore a premium subscription option! - Alanna

review: Not only is it incredibly expensive, but apparently you also have to pay for every device you want to use this app on? Honestly? The features are fine and the UI looks clean so I really wanted to give this a go and got the monthly subscription, yet I started regretting that choice not even an hour after the purchase. I just can't wrap my mind around why I would need to pay twice...

SO MUCH POTENTIAL WITH THIS APP! This app falls short. Firstly get rid of the bugs, there are many bugs that need to be fixed seriously. I cant seem to change the time of reminders for my study group which is really annoying or set specific days. Features that would be great to see added (for premium at least) would be actual messaging between members in a group and being able to make friends on the app (not just messaging with alana to troubleshoot). Automatic locks should be schedulable too.

I love the interface and features, visually it's very clean and easy to use. And you get so many great features in the free version! My only issue is sometimes it doesn't work. For example, when running a "mindful moment" timer, when I lock my phone the session ends, making it completely unusable.
ras4vb: Thanks Iman for your kind review and feedback, we will share with our team. If you're still having trouble please send an email to info@flipdapp.co - Melissa

review: Absolute necessity - this app really helped me (forced me) to put down my phone and focus on work when I needed to. It's super effective, and i like that you can still access certain phone functions/apps that you set in advance. In addition, the customer service at Flipd has been incredible - Alana was super responsive and helpful. A great experience all around.

I used to have no problems with the app but it has been functioning terribly lately. I can no longer edit my whitelist or click on my whitelist to go to specific apps during focus lock. I have the latest version of the app and have reinstalled more than once. Pausing the app is also super annoying because the confirmation message won't go away. It's sad, I used to love it and it helped me a lot. It's basically unusable for me now.
ras4vb: Hi Corey, thanks for your review! Have you had a chance to try out the latest version of the app? If it's still not working well for you please contact us at info@flipdapp.co. Thank you! - Alanna

review: A recent update locked a lot of previously free features that I had gotten used to using behind a paywall. I can no longer flip off for a custom time, only the preset times of several hours. I have ADHD, and I used the app to flip off for 5-30 minutes at a time to manually disengage from my phone and get started on tasks, but not block me from my phone if I need it. Now I can no longer do that without shelling out money. Currently looking for an alternative to this app.

I've enjoyed it so far, especially the full lock feature. My current problem is that the iPad app won't let me select higher than 4 hours, despite 12 and 8 being on screen. In addition to this, when I log into my account on my phone it says that the 4 hour iPad session last night has completed, but my iPad is still Flipd off, and I have no access to my apps. Update: uninstalling the flipd MDM thing in settings worked, but I'd still like to know how to not have this happen in future.

It's a great concept but the app needs more work. I 'flipped off' for 30 minutes and the timer kept freezing. In reality I was locked out for about an hour. Also you can't choose which apps you're allowed access to. I use bus pass to get around and I don't have access to that while 'flipped off'. Also I use Pandora and Spotify. I was given access Spotify but not Pandora. I use Pandora more so it would be nice to choose that over Spotify.

This was a great app, i used it for studying and sleep. However last night I set the timer for 8 hours, and when I woke up 8 hours later the timer had 6 hours left. Not ideal because I need to use my phone during the day. Unlike other timer apps there is literally zero way to tap out of it, not even by uninstalling or disabling permissions through settings. While this is good for productivity, it's rather annoying in cases like this. I'll be using a different app in the future, which is a shame.
